definition.achievementDescription: You craft godlium tools in the same way, using 1 core, a diamond tool catalyst, and as many godlium as a standard tool, IE 3 for a pickaxe, 1 for a shovel
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false" x="126" y="32"><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GodliumSword</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GodliumPickaxe</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GodliumAxe</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GodliumShovel</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GodliumHoe</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
